Pagination

Pagination is for paginating. Use the rel attributes of the "Previous" and "Next" anchors to indicate prev or next. Not only is it good markup, we use it as a styling hook for adding the nifty arrows.

.nav-pagination

  • Previous
  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6
  • 7
  • 8
  • 9
  • Next
 <ul class="nav-pagination">
	<li><a rel="prev" href="#">Previous</a></li>	
	<li><a href="#">1</a></li>
	<li class="selected"><a href="#">2</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">3</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">4</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">5</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">6</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">7</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">8</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">9</a></li>
	<li><a rel="next" href="#">Next</a></li>	
</ul>

Append-style paging

We often have a list of stuff that has a "see more" button at the bottom that ajax appends more content. The feed or meetups list on group home does this.

.nav-appendPager

A few things

  • Leggings Austin minim readymade aliquip, elit voluptate aesthetic. Cosby sweater organic single-origin coffee aliquip adipisicing, food truck american apparel. Aesthetic high life qui retro cliche.

  • Leggings Austin minim readymade aliquip, elit voluptate aesthetic. Cosby sweater organic single-origin coffee aliquip adipisicing, food truck american apparel. Aesthetic high life qui retro cliche.

Button groups (filtering)

Buttons joined in groups, presented as a list of options. Most useful for filtering/sorting lists, but we may be able to use this for other things.

.nav-buttons

Sort by:
Sort by:
  • Date Joined
  • Size
  • Name
  • Role
				<h5>Sort by:</h5>
<ul class="nav-buttons">
	<li><a >Date Joined</a></li>
	<li><a class="selected">Size</a></li>
	<li><a >Name</a></li>
	<li><a >Role</a></li>
</ul>

Tabs

Tabbed navigation. Used mostly as secondary navigation on Meetup; load the tab content with web:ajax where possible.

.nav-tabs

  • Upcoming Meetups
  • Past Meetups
  • Selected tab
<ul class="nav-tabs">
	<li><a href="#">Upcoming Meetups</a></li>
	<li><a href="#">Past  Meetups</a></li>
	<li class="selected"><a href="#">Selected tab</a></li>
</ul>
